fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Aqua Simulacra
Is very strong in both high and low ER situations, but you might find it harder to build around this weapon at very high ER requirements.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__High ER requirements:__ Elegy for the End, Favonius Warbow
__Lower ER requirements:__ +R3 Mouun's Moon/The Stringless, Slingshot
__Worth mentioning:__ +R3 Sacrificial Bow, R5 Fading Twilight, Recurve Bow

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value:
<sands> HP% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Hydro DMG Bonus or HP% |<circlet>  CRIT DMG/CRIT Rate or HP%
__More than two HP% main stats are not recommended.__

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Depth-Clarion Dice
**2)** Elemental Skill: Lingering Lifeline
**3)** Normal Attack: Stealthy Bowshot

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Yelan needs a lot of Energy Recharge. Do not underestimate the need of it and make sure you can use her Burst every rotation off cooldown.
